computer issues Replaced hardware and restored systems Collaborated with the helpdesk to provide initial oncall support for 98 of all trouble calls Brought the companys Great Plans financial server back online after a hardware failure at 200 am using Symantec System Restore and dissembler hardware Halted an email attack compromising the network by disconnecting the Linux relay server rerouting email MX records through a PIX firewall and building a Windows 2003 based DNS names server Took the initiative to learn new applications and ensure the security of external servers and demonstrated
